sentences.en: Administrators at Northwest Missouri State University wanted to find out.
sentences.cn: 密苏里州西北大学管理人想到了调查.

sentences.en: Dark clouds loom over grain fields near the Missouri Breaks.
sentences.cn: 乌云在密苏里山口附近的农田上方隐隐呈现.

sentences.en: He had relocated his family for the position from Ohio to Missouri, where he bought a home.
sentences.cn: 为了这个职位，他从俄亥俄州举家搬迁到密苏里州，并且买了一幢房子。

sentences.en: He is not easily convinced because he is from Missouri.
sentences.cn: 他是来自密苏里州,所以不容易说服他.

sentences.en: He was trying to woo the daughter of a Missouri aris - tocrat.
sentences.cn: 他正试图追求一位密苏里的豪门小姐.

sentences.en: In Missouri, the same factors cut my victory margin almost in half, from 10 to 6 percent.
sentences.cn: 在密苏里州，同样的因素让我的获胜优势几乎减少了一半，从10%降到6%。

sentences.en: In past presidential elections, Missouri has been a barometer of the rest of the country.
sentences.cn: 在过去的总统选举中，密苏里州一直是国内其他州的晴雨表。

sentences.en: Lived in Illinois, Missouri, Colorado and Idaho, experiencing poverty and affluence.
sentences.cn: 居住地:(国)利诺斯州 、 苏里州 、 罗拉多州和爱达荷州, 体验贫穷与富足.(国人一辈子平均要搬6次家,这对丰富阅历很有帮助.

sentences.en: Mark Twain edited a newspaper in Missouri.
sentences.cn: 马克·吐温在密苏里编辑了一种报纸.

sentences.en: Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Agreement is governed by Missouri law.
sentences.cn: 除上述之外, 本合约受密苏里州法律的约束.

sentences.en: President Bush traveled to Missouri to talk about Healthcare.
sentences.cn: 布什总统前往密苏里州讨论健康保险问题.

sentences.en: Researchers at the University of Missouri looked at how viewers of these ads absorb the message.
sentences.cn: 密苏里大学的研究人员们观察了看这些广告的人如何接受这个讯息。

sentences.en: Spectators line sidewalks from Missouri Avenue down to Banneker Park.
sentences.cn: 从密苏里大道到班纳克公园之间的人行道上站满了观众.

sentences.en: The Columbia, the Missouri, the Platte, the Mississippi, the Colorado Rivers.
sentences.cn: 哥伦比亚, 密苏里, 普拉特, 密西西比河, 科罗拉多河.

sentences.en: The deposits is very similar to the Mississippi Valley Type deposits in Appalachian and Missouri, USA.
sentences.cn: 矿床成因属密西西比河谷型(MVT),其地质特点可与北美Appalachia地区和Missouri地区的MVT矿床对比.

sentences.en: The family come from St Louis, Missouri, but on their webpage say they plan to travel around the US.
sentences.cn: 这一家人来自密苏里州圣路易斯市，但是他们在自己的网页上言明打算游遍全美国。

sentences.en: The Missouri River is the chief tributary of the Mississippi.
sentences.cn: 密苏里河是密西西比河的主要支流.

sentences.en: There are now no more straight boring roads, and the deadly humidity of Missouri and others states are behind me.
sentences.cn: 现在不再有那些笔直单调的长路了，密苏里和其它几个州的湿热也留在了我身后。

sentences.en: We live in Missouri.
sentences.cn: 我们住在密苏里州。

sentences.en: We must have passed by 40 bone factories going across Missouri.
sentences.cn: 穿过密苏里州,我们至少经过了四十个墓地.

sentences.en: You know what they do in Ealing, Missouri?
sentences.cn: 你知道密苏里州的伊令镇怎么了 吗 ?
